'''Ashen Aratiku Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Ashen Aratiku Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Ashen Aratiku Wood can be found around the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=645 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
